balapathra nemathiwa yapanayata magi prawahanaya kalapaudgalika bas ratha himikaruwan 13 denakuta erehina jathika gamanagamana komisama wisin eeye (25) kolambaa athireka mahesthrath je toski mahatha hamuwe nadu pawarini.jathika gamanagamana komishan sabhawa wisin nikuth karanu labu magi sewa awasara pathrayak nomathi wa mese kotahena sita yapanaya dakwa dhawanaya kala paudgalika bas ratha himikaruwan 13denekuta erehiwa adhikaranaya hamuwe nadu pawaranu labina.mese nadu pawaranu labuwe marga anka 87 hi kotahena sita ambaathale haraha yapanaya dakwa wen wen gasthu sadaha magin prawahanaya karanu labu paudgalika bas rathawalata ya.jathika gamanagamana komishan sabhawe sabhapathi roshan gunawardhana mahatha mema siddhinwala paminilikaru we. 2012/juli 13wana dinakata aasanna dinaka di blumandal pare di sidu karana lada meheyumaka di mema paudgalika bas ratha komisama barayata gena atha. 2005 anka 27 gamanagamana panatha 1991 anka 37 jathika komishan sabha panathe 18 wana waganthiye 40 wana waganthi prakarawa withthikaruwan daduwam labiya haki waradak bawata komisama adhikaranayata karunu wartha kara thibina.thrikunamalaya padinchi senadhira shiwakumar, kolambaa 13 , padinchi di mathialagan ,galaha padinchi kumarawel sindrajan ,puththalama padinchi prabhath madhushanka ,palgahathanna padinchi aar disanayaka,puththalama padinchi rajes kumar ,puththalama padinchi mehomad yash, wallawaththa padinchi wasantha kumar ,wadukkodeyi padinchi sinnadore nanda kumar ,abewela welu ramasami ,galnawa thilak priyantha herath,wawuniyawe pi padmarajan ha bagawanthalawa selwaraja shashidharan namathi withthikaruwanta mese adhikaranaya hamuwe nadu pawaranu labina..
